biotools.summary: Rank Constrained Similarity Learning (RCSL) is Clustering single-cell RNA-seq data by rank constrained similarity learning. RCSL is an R toolkit for single-cell clustering and trajectory analysis using single-cell RNA-seq data.

bioschemas.name: RCSL
bioschemas.summary: Rank Constrained Similarity Learning (RCSL) is Clustering single-cell RNA-seq data by rank constrained similarity learning. RCSL is an R toolkit for single-cell clustering and trajectory analysis using single-cell RNA-seq data.
